row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE
row.description: Read the file and store into string variable

row.process: ! Reading xml file and pleace it in one AE variable :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE (&AGENT#, "&UC4RB_DKR_FILE_PATH#",,"COL=NONE", 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILE_CONTENT# = "" :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_DKR_FILE_CONTENT#, &LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
